wikipedia_page.main: Claire Harman is a British actress and narrator, known for narrating the ITV series Dickinson's Real Deal. She also portrayed the lead role in the Brookside DVD Unfinished Business. She has also had a starring role in the second series of Sky TV's Is Harry on the Boat. Harman's other TV credits include Casualty, Doctors, Merseybeat and Coronation Street. Her film credits include About a Boy and Last Orders.

response: | The mother of Suzy (Claire Harman) who tells her to stop faking back issues in order to see her doctor.
